articles.description: The January transfer window opens in under a fortnight and while it is far from a given that Liverpool will make a signing, they will be on the lookout for possible recruits
articles.content:
Liverpool's need to add to their squad during January is clear in the opinion of plenty of supporters, though finding the right option mid-season will prove difficult.
The Premier League leaders are… [+2981 chars]

articles.author: Bryony Jewell
articles.title: RHOCH's Dawn Ward is seen for the first time since being dragged into 'Wagatha Christie' war - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Real Housewives Of Cheshire star, 47, cut a casual figure in a black Givenchy jumper and leather leggings as she held onto the retired footballer's hand.
articles.content:
She was named by Rebekah Vardy as part of a group with access to Coleen Rooney's private Instagram account in recent court documents from their libel case.
And Dawn Ward appeared unfazed by the rece… [+8128 chars]
